com.qtfx.lib.gui

Class Nodes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.gui.Nodes

  • public class Nodes
extends Object
    Nodes in this JavaFX development tools are sometimes expected to have properties in the user data. This class help manage those properties.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • getProperty

        public static javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<Object> getProperty(javafx.scene.Node node,
                                                                             Object key)
        Return the property with the given key. If the property has not been set, a new empty property with the given key is set.
        Parameters:
        node - The node.
        key - The key.
        Returns:
        The property.

      • getPropertyMap

        public static javafx.beans.property.SimpleMapProperty<Object,javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<Object>> getPropertyMap(javafx.scene.Node node)
        Return a property map set in the user data of the node. If the node has a user data of a non SimpleMapProperty class, an illegal argument exception is thrown.

        The usage of an observable map with observable object properties allows adding listeners either to the map or the properties.

        Parameters:
        node - The node.
        Returns:
        The property map.
